name: KiKi Car Dance Challenge
description:
Do you love kiiki challenge? Get ready to have KiKi Car Dance Challenge to perform hip hop dance step on number of music playlist. Let’s get out of your luxurious car to Accept keke dance Shiggy Challenge in this fun game. Remember, the car is still moving but you have to match your move with the car speed to Record your Dance step by performing on different music. All you need to show your dancing skills on different music and songs. Come out of the car and start dancing on street to Win keke challenge now.

You might have heard about the keke challenge. Of course the kiiki dance challenge is getting viral but wait a minute have you played KiKi Car Dance Challenge game? Let’s play this unique keke love challenge fun game and start recording your video that will drive you crazy. Select your favourite car, drive to go outside and start dancing on different music challenge to complete the level in this new Keke Challenge. Show your best hip hop dance move against running car. Open the door step of the luxurious car and come out to dance.

You guys are definitely familiar with ice bucket challenge of gushing water under bucket filled with ice cubes and then challenge to your friends or family members. Bravo! The whole new KiKi Car Dance Challenge is there with super Shiggy Challenge. All you have to do is drive your favourite car and come out from the running car to record your dance step dance outside. It’s not simple dance, get out of a moving vehicle and start dance on different music lines from draake Hit new song. Come and be a part of viral trend of keke challenge. Make your signature hearth move and be careful with obstacles and with the speed and direction of the car while dancing.

So if you still haven’t done it, Just jumped on to this trend keke love dance challenge. Get exhilarated with most illustrious trend that What is Keke love Challenge/ Shiggy Challenge?

Download the newest trendy KiKi Car Dance Challenge game the first of its kind. Dance and make amazing video outside new car that is taking over the internet and challenge your friends.

Best Features of Kiki Challenge:

3D Amazing environment
HD beautiful graphics
Multiple Dancing animations
Immersive sound effects
Interesting Keke Challenge
New trendy dance challenge
Exciting levels to play
Multiple cars to select for dancing
